description.english: You built your glider!
description.german: Du hast deinen Gleiter gebaut!
description.french: Tu as construit votre planeur!
description.italian: Hai costruito il tuo aliante!
description.spanish: ¡Has construido tu planeador!
description.schinese: 你建造了你的滑翔机！
description.tchinese: 你已建造滑翔機！
description.japanese: 自分のグライダーを作成した！
description.brazilian: Você construiu seu planador!

description.english: You've solved the Temple of the Waves!
description.german: Du hast den Tempel der Wellen gelöst!
description.french: Tu as résolu le Temple des Vagues!
description.italian: Hai risolto il Tempio delle Onde!
description.spanish: ¡Has resuelto el Templo de las Olas!
description.schinese: 你解开了浪花神殿的谜题！
description.tchinese: 你已解開海浪神廟的謎題！
description.japanese: 波の神殿の謎を解いた！
description.brazilian: Você solucionou o Templo das Ondas!

displayName.french: Il y a quelque chose dans l’eau

description.english: You've filled the Bundle of the Waves!
description.german: Du hast das Bündel der Wellen gefüllt!
description.french: Tu as rempli le lot des vagues!
description.italian: Hai riempito il Pacchetto delle onde!
description.spanish: ¡Has llenado el lote de las Olas!
description.schinese: 你已经完成了浪花收集！
description.tchinese: 你填滿了海浪束！
description.japanese: 波のバンドルを完了した！
description.brazilian: Você encheu o pacote das ondas!

description.english: You've read every lost relic in the Temple of the Waves!
description.german: Du hast jedes verlorene Relikt im Tempel der Wellen gelesen!
description.french: Tu as lu toutes les reliques perdues dans le Temple des Vagues!
description.italian: Hai letto ogni reliquia perduta nel Tempio delle Onde!
description.koreana: 파도의 사원 내 모든 잃어버린 유물을 찾아냈습니다!
description.spanish: ¡Has leído todas las reliquias perdidas en el Templo de las Olas!
description.schinese: 你已阅读浪花神殿丢失的所有遗物！
description.tchinese: 你已閱讀海浪神廟的所有失落文物！
description.japanese: 波の神殿で失われた遺物をすべて読んだ。
description.brazilian: Você já leu todas as relíquias perdidas no Templo das Ondas!

description.english: You've solved the Temple of the Flames!
description.german: Du hast den Tempel der Flammen gelöst!
description.french: Tu as résolu le Temple des flammes!
description.italian: Hai scoperto il Tempio delle fiamme!
description.spanish: ¡Has resuelto el Templo de las Llamas!
description.schinese: 你解开了烈焰神殿的谜题！
description.tchinese: 你已解開火舌神廟的謎題！
description.japanese: 炎の神殿の謎を解いた！
description.brazilian: Você solucionou o Templo das Chamas!

description.english: You've solved the Temple of the Gales!
description.german: Du hast den Tempel der Winde gelöst!
description.french: Tu as résolu le Temple des bourrasques!
description.italian: Hai scoperto il Tempio delle burrasche!
description.spanish: ¡Has resuelto el Templo de los Vendavales!

description.tchinese: 你已解開烈風神殿的謎題！
description.japanese: ゲールズの神殿の謎を解いた！

description.english: You've filled the Bundle of the Gales!
description.german: Du hast das Bündel der Winde gefüllt!
description.french: Libère un mystère dans les cieux de Kilima.
description.italian: Hai completato il Pacchetto delle Burrasche!
description.spanish: ¡Has llenado el lote de los Vendavales!
description.schinese: 你已经完成了狂风收集！
description.tchinese: 你填滿了烈風束！
description.japanese: ゲールズのバンドルを完了した！
description.brazilian: Você encheu o Pacote das Tempestades!

description.english: You pilfered the Temple of the Gales for Zeki!
description.german: Du hast den Tempel der Winde für Zeki geplündert!
description.french: Tu as pillé le Temple des bourrasques pour Zeki!
description.italian: Hai saccheggiato il Tempio delle burrasche per Zeki!
description.spanish: ¡Has robado el Templo de los vendavales para Zeki!
description.schinese: 你为泽基偷窃了狂风神殿！
description.tchinese: 你為澤奇洗劫了烈風神殿！
description.japanese: ゼキのためにゲールズの神殿へ泥棒に入った！
description.brazilian: Você furtou o Templo das Tempestades para o Zeki!

description.english: You helped Elouisa and Caleri come to a conclusion about the Silverwings!
description.german: Du hast Elouisa und Caleri dabei geholfen, eine Entscheidung über die Silberschwingen zu treffen.
description.french: Tu as aidé Élouisa et Caléri à arriver à une conclusion à propos des ailes-d'argent!
description.italian: Hai aiutato Elouisa e Caleri a giungere a una conclusione sull’Alargentea!
description.koreana: 엘로이자와 칼레리를 도와 은빛날개에 관한 결론을 이끌어냈습니다!
description.spanish: ¡Has ayudado a Elouisa y Caleri a llegar a una conclusión sobre los alargenta!
description.schinese: 你帮助艾路易莎和卡莱里得出了关于银翼的结论！
description.tchinese: 你幫助愛羅伊莎和卡蕾莉得出了關於銀翼的結論。
description.japanese: エルイーゼとカレーリに手を貸して、シルバーウィングについて決着をつける手助けをした！
description.brazilian: Você ajudou Elouisa e Caleri a chegarem em uma conclusão sobre os Asas Prateadas!

description.english: You've solved the Temple of the Roots!
description.german: Du hast den Tempel der Wurzeln gelöst!
description.french: Tu as résolu le Temple des Bourrasques!
description.italian: Hai completato il Tempio delle radici!
description.spanish: ¡Has resuelto el Templo de las Raíces!
description.schinese: 你已解开根之神殿的谜题！
description.tchinese: 你已解開熱根神廟的謎題！
description.japanese: 根の神殿の謎を解いた！
description.brazilian: Você solucionou o Templo das Raízes!

description.japanese: 根のバンドルを完了した！

description.english: You bought something from the Grimalkin Underground!

description.tchinese: 你向喵靈地下市集購買了東西！
description.japanese: グリマルキンの闇市で商品を購入した！
description.brazilian: Você comprou algo no Subterrâneo Grimalkin!

description.english: You built a house!

description.french: Tu as construit une maison!
description.italian: Hai costruito una casa!
description.spanish: ¡Has construido una casa!
description.schinese: 你建了一栋房屋！
description.tchinese: 你已建造一座房屋。
description.japanese: 家を建てた！
description.brazilian: Você construiu uma casa!

displayName.japanese: みんなをつなげるもの

description.english: You acquired a villagers pin!
description.german: Du hast eine Anstecknadel für Dorfbewohner erhalten!
description.french: Tu as acquis une broche de villageois!
description.italian: Hai acquisito una spilla per gli abitanti del villaggio!
description.spanish: You acquired a villagers pin!
description.schinese: 你获得了一个村民的胸针！
description.tchinese: 你已獲得一個村民的胸針！
description.japanese: 村人からピンをもらった！
description.brazilian: Você adquiriu um broche de um habitante!

description.english: Found 12 of the hidden treasure chests in Kilima Village.
description.german: Du hast 12 der versteckten Schatztruhen im Dorf Kilima gefunden.
description.french: Tu as 12 des coffres au trésor cachés dans le village de Kilima.
description.italian: Trovati 12 degli scrigni del tesoro nascosti nel villaggio di Kilima.
description.koreana: 킬리마 마을에서 숨겨진 보물 상자 12개를 찾았습니다.
description.spanish: Has encontrado 12 de los cofres del tesoro escondidos en el pueblo de Kilima.
description.schinese: 已找到基利马村12个隐藏的宝箱。
description.tchinese: 你已在吉力馬村找到12個隱藏的寶箱。
description.japanese: キリマ村に隠された宝箱を12個見つける。
description.brazilian: Encontrou 12 baús de tesouros escondidos na Vila Kilima.

description.english: Found 30 of the hidden treasure chests in Bahari Bay.
description.german: Du hast 30 der versteckten Schatztruhen in Bahari-Bucht gefunden.
description.french: Trouvé 30 des coffres au trésor cachés dans la Baie du Bahari.
description.italian: Trovati 30 degli scrigni del tesoro nascosti nella Cala Bahari.
description.spanish: Has encontrado 30 de los cofres del tesoro escondidos en la bahía de Bahari.
description.schinese: 已找到巴哈利湾30个隐藏的宝箱。
description.tchinese: 已在巴哈里灣找到30個隱藏的寶箱。
description.japanese: バハリ湾に隠された宝箱を30個見つけた。
description.brazilian: Encontrou 30 baús de tesouros escondidos na Baía Bahari.

description.english: Found all of Einar's lost pebbles.
description.german: Du hast alle verlorenen Steinchen von Einar gefunden.
description.french: J’ai trouvé tous les cailloux perdus d’Einar.
description.italian: Hai trovato tutti i ciottoli persi di Einar.
description.spanish: Has encontrado todas las piedras perdidas de Einar.
description.schinese: 已找到艾纳丢失的所有鹅卵石。
description.tchinese: 已找到所有艾納弄丟的鵝卵石。
description.japanese: アイナーがなくした小石をすべて見つけた。
description.brazilian: Encontrou todas as pedras perdidas do Einar.
